events.message: I received my order yesterday but decided I want to return it because it doesn't meet my expectations. How do I go about getting a refund?
The customer's request relates to returning a product and obtaining a refund, fitting the Refund category.
Case assigned to the refunds specialist team to handle the return request and refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number so I can check the details?
To start the refund process, I need to confirm whether the product has been opened or used, and ask for the reason for your return.
The order number is 4583921. The product is still unopened, and I simply changed my mind after seeing a better option elsewhere.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund since the product is unopened. Please use the prepaid return label we will email you shortly to send the item back.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions! I appreciate the prepaid label for the return.
Your refund case is now set up. Once we receive the returned product, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have successfully sent back the product and to remind you that the refund will be processed shortly upon receipt.
The refund has been completed and credited to your original payment method. We are closing this support case now, and thank you for your patience.
